ModMetaData.name: Quality Furniture Matters
ModMetaData.author: Dakota Copas
ModMetaData.description:
Small, quality-based rest-effectiveness bonuses from nearby furniture (end tables and dressers).
Bonuses are calculated at runtime from furniture quality; furniture do not show a special `BedRestEffectiveness` stat. Defaults are conservative to preserve vanilla balance: max 1 dresser, max 1 end table, and max 2 total furniture counted per bed. In-game settings (Mods → Quality Furniture Matters → Settings) let you toggle furniture types, change per-bed caps, and apply a global multiplier.
See the README or Releases page for download and full details: https://github.com/GrandMasterK414/QualityFurnitureMatters/releases/tag/v0.1.2
